description:
The king unveils a new virtual reality training program at Rosewood Academy. However, it inadvertently creates a rift in the friend group made up of Claire, Yessica, Clay, and Kassim. Now it`s up to Blade to patch things up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Springtime of Life at Rosewood Academy
ローズウッド学園の青春
